mapper.select: SELECT no,name,start,end,color,description,id FROM plan where team_no = #{teamNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN ( NAME, START, END, COLOR, DESCRIPTION, TEAM_NO, ID, ALLDAY ) VALUES (#{name},#{start},#{end},#{color},#{description},#{teamNo},#{id},#{allDay})
mapper.update: update PLAN set NAME = #{name}, START =#{start}, END = #{end}, COLOR = #{color}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}, ID = #{id}, ALLDAY = #{allDay} where no = #{no}
